cards.name: Poor House
cards.description:
+$4
Reveal your hand. -$1 per Treasure card in your hand. (You can't go below $0.)

cards.name: Beggar
cards.description:
Gain 3 Coppers to your hand.
----------
When another player plays an Attack card, you may first discard this to gain 2 Silvers, putting one onto your deck.

cards.name: Squire
cards.description:
+$1
Choose one: +2 Actions; or +2 Buys; or gain a Silver.
----------
When you trash this, gain an Attack card.

cards.name: Vagrant
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Curse, Ruins, Shelter, or Victory card, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Forager
cards.description:
+1 Action
+1 Buy
Trash a card from your hand, then +$1 per differently named Treasure in the trash.

cards.name: Hermit
cards.description:
Look through your discard pile. You may trash a non-Treasure card from your discard pile or hand. Gain a card costing up to $3.
----------
When you discard this from play, if you didn't buy any cards this turn, trash this and gain a Madman from the Madman pile.

cards.name: Market Square
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+1 Buy
----------
When one of your cards is trashed, you may discard this from your hand to gain a Gold.

cards.name: Sage
cards.description:
+1 Action
Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal one costing $3 or more. Put that card into your hand and discard the rest.

cards.name: Storeroom
cards.description:
+1 Buy
Discard any number of cards, then draw that many. Then discard any number of cards for +$1 each.

cards.name: Urchin
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Each other player discards down to 4 cards in hand.
----------
When you play another Attack card with this in play, you may first trash this, to gain a Mercenary from the Mercenary pile.

cards.name: Armory
cards.description: Gain a card onto your deck costing up to $4.

cards.name: Death Cart
cards.description:
+$5
You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you don't, trash this.
----------
When you gain this, gain two Ruins.

cards.name: Feodum
cards.description:
Worth 1VP per 3 Silvers you have (round down).
----------
When you trash this, gain 3 Silvers.

cards.name: Fortress
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
----------
When you trash this, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Ironmonger
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck; you may discard it. Either way, if it's an...
Action card, +1 Action
Treasure card, +$1
Victory card, +1 Card

cards.name: Marauder
cards.description: Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile. Each other player gains a Ruins.

cards.name: Procession
cards.description: You may play an Action card from your hand twice. Trash it. Gain an Action card costing exactly $1 more than it.

cards.name: Rats
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Gain a Rats. Trash a card from your hand other than a Rats (or reveal a hand of all Rats).
----------
When you trash this, +1 Card.

cards.name: Scavenger
cards.description:
+$2
You may put your deck into your discard pile. Look through your discard pile and put one card from it onto your deck.

cards.name: Wandering Minstrel
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. Put the Actions back on top in any order and discard the rest.

cards.name: Band of Misfits
cards.description: Play this as if it were a cheaper Action card in the Supply. This is that card until it leaves play.

cards.name: Bandit Camp
cards.description:
+1 Card
+2 Actions
Gain a Spoils from the Spoils pile.

cards.name: Catacombs
cards.description:
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. Choose one: Put them into your hand; or discard them and +3 Cards.
----------
When you trash this, gain a cheaper card.

cards.name: Count
cards.description:
Choose one: Discard 2 cards; or put a card from your hand onto your deck; or gain a Copper.
Choose one: +$3; trash your hand; or gain a Duchy.

cards.name: Counterfeit
cards.description:
Worth $1
+1 Buy
When you play this, you may play a treasure from your hand twice. If you do, trash that treasure.

cards.name: Cultist
cards.description:
+2 Cards
Each other player gains a Ruins. You may play a Cultist from your hand.
----------
When you trash this, +3 Cards.

cards.name: Graverobber
cards.description: Choose one: Gain a card from the trash costing from $3 to $6, onto your deck; or trash an Action card from your hand and gain a card costing up to $3 more than it.

cards.name: Junk Dealer
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
Trash a card from your hand.

cards.name: Knights
cards.description: Shuffle the Knights pile before each game with it. Keep it face down except for the top card, which is the only one that can be bought or gained.

cards.name: Mystic
cards.description:
+1 Action
+$2
Name a card, then reveal the top card of your deck. If you named it, put it into your hand.

cards.name: Pillage
cards.description: Trash this. Each other player with 5 or more cards in hand reveals their hand and discards a card that you choose. Gain 2 Spoils from the Spoils pile.

cards.name: Rebuild
cards.description:
+1 Action
Name a card. Reveal cards from your deck until you reveal a Victory card you did not name. Discard the rest, trash the Victory card, and gain a Victory card costing up to $3 more than it.

cards.name: Rogue
cards.description:
+$2
If there are any cards in the trash costing from $3 to $6, gain one of them. Otherwise, each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest.

cards.name: Altar
cards.description: Trash a card from your hand. Gain a card costing up to $5.

cards.name: Hunting Grounds
cards.description:
+4 Cards
----------
When you trash this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

knights.name: Knights
knights.info: Shuffle the Knight pile before each game with it. Keep it face down except for the top card, which is the only one that can be bought or gained.

cards.name: Dame Anna
cards.description:
You may trash up to 2 cards from your hand.
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.

cards.name: Dame Josephine
cards.description:
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.
----------
Worth 2VP

cards.name: Dame Molly
cards.description:
+2 Actions
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.

cards.name: Dame Natalie
cards.description:
You may gain a card costing up to $3.
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.

cards.name: Dame Sylvia
cards.description:
+$2
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.

cards.name: Sir Bailey
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.

cards.name: Sir Destry
cards.description:
+2 Cards
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.

cards.name: Sir Martin
cards.description:
+2 Buys
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.

cards.name: Sir Michael
cards.description:
Each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.

cards.name: Sir Vander
cards.description:
Each other player reveals the top two cards of their deck, trashes one of them costing from $3 to $6, and discards the rest. If a Knight is trashed by this, trash this.
----------
When you trash this, gain a Gold.

cards.name: Madman
cards.description:
+2 Actions
Return this to the Madman pile. If you do, +1 Card per card in your hand.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Mercenary
cards.description:
You may trash 2 cards from your hand. If you do, +2 Cards, +$2, and each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Spoils
cards.description:
$3
When you play this, return it to the pile.
(This is not in the Supply.)

cards.name: Ruined Library
cards.description: +1 Card

cards.name: Ruined Market
cards.description: +1 Buy

cards.name: Ruined Village
cards.description: +1 Action

cards.name: Survivors
cards.description: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Discard them or put them back in any order.

cards.name: Hovel
cards.description: When you buy a Victory card, you may trash this from your hand.

cards.name: Necropolis
cards.description: +2 Actions

cards.name: Overgrown Estate
cards.description:
0VP
----------
When you trash this, +1 Card.
